subtitle: A fun Saturday night supper for the family!

method.text: Preheat a medium grill. Grill the sausages for 8-10 min, turning occasionally, until evenly browned. Reduce heat to low. Brush the sausages liberally with taco sauce. Grill for 1-2 min.
Warm the taco shells according to pack instructions.
Arrange the lettuce leaves, kidney beans, avocado and olives in each taco.
Place sausages in the prepared tacos. Serve.

title: Sausage tacos
